abstract: Documentary filmmaker Morgan Spurlock and others are leading program to help filmmakers find product placement money to market and distribute their movies.
snippet: A program led by Morgan Spurlock and others will help documentary filmmakers find the money to market and distribute their movies.
lead_paragraph: A program led by Morgan Spurlock and others will help documentary filmmakers find the money to market and distribute their movies.

headline.main: A Filmmaker Wants to Help Others Use Product Placement
headline.print_headline: A Filmmaker Wants to Help Others Use Product Placement
